Text: 9th Virginia Regiment:  At Germantown, under the command of Colonel George Mathews, the unit became separated from the remainder of General Nathanael Greene's division and over 400 men were taken prisoner by the British.
Triplets:<9th Virginia Regiment
5:
--------------------
Text: 9th Virginia Regiment:  The regiment penetrated so deeply into the British lines that it was isolated.

Text: 9th Virginia Regiment:  Surprised, the 9th was driven farther into the British camp where it was beset by the brigade of Charles Grey, 1st Earl Grey and the 2nd British Light Infantry Battalion.

<Text: 9th Virginia Regiment: The unit was captured on May 12, 1780, by the British Army at the Siege of Charleston and was disbanded on November 15, 1783.>
